body:
Trying to build `gcc@7.3.0` on `CentOS 8` for `ppc64le` (`power8` host).

Using Spack @ `develop` (commit 17e4df1e4 - 16-March-2020) and the system-installed `gcc@8.3.1` as the base compiler

```
$> spack install gcc@7.3.0+strip target=ppc64le
...
==> Error: Failed to install gcc due to ChildError: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16'
1 warning found in build log:
     1419    checking for shared library run path origin... (cached) done
     1420    no
     1421    checking for VALGRIND_DISCARD in <memcheck.h>... checking for iconv... (cached) yes
     1422    checking for iconv declaration... (cached) install-shextern size_t iconv (iconv_t cd, char * *inbuf, size_t *inbytesleft, char * *outbuf, size_t
              *outbytesleft);
     1423    no
     1424    checking for multiarch configuration... auto
  >> 1425    configure: WARNING: fixed-point is not supported for this target, ignored
     1426    configure: creating ./config.status
     1427    checking whether make sets $(MAKE)... (cached) yes
     1428    checking for gawk... (cached) gawk
     1429    checking whether ln -s works... (cached) yes
     1430    checking whether ln works... (cached) yes
     1431    checking for powerpc64le-unknown-linux-gnu-ranlib... (cached) ranlib
```

Full build log: [gcc730-centos8-fail.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4340177/gcc730-centos8-fail.txt)
